title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Write a 3-page report on the structure and function of eukaryotic cells. Include a detailed description of the nucleus, mitochondria, and ribosomes. Use at least three academic sources.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Create a 10-minute presentation on how the Industrial Revolution affected urbanization and labor. Include at least two case studies from different countries.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Write a comparative analysis of two works of literature from different periods. Focus on themes of identity and societal roles. Provide textual evidence to support your arguments.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Design a psychological experiment to test the effects of sleep deprivation on cognitive performance. Include hypothesis, methods, and anticipated results.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Develop a basic mobile app that helps users track their daily water intake. Submit the source code along with a user manual.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Analyze the current state of the housing market in your city. Include factors such as supply, demand, and government policies. Use statistical data and charts.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Visit a local museum and write a review of one exhibit. Discuss the curation, key pieces, and overall impact. Include photos if allowed.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Conduct an ethnographic study on a subculture within your community. Document your observations and analyze the social dynamics and cultural practices.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Perform an experiment to measure the acceleration due to gravity using a pendulum. Write a lab report detailing your procedure, data, and conclusions.
